post.body: haha wow that's an old tweet. Tweet deck sounds useful I'll have to look into it.
It's only hard if you make it hard.
I'll throw in my two cents: It's awesome! :)
what type of HDD is it though?
What type of HDD? Do an unboxing video lol!
XD haha yeaaah... thanks for the idea lol
Congrats on your license man! :D
Heh it was well worth the wait! Paired with MC Frontalot's music it's just pure awesome!
http://tinyurl.com/56o5rs I appreciate the help! Here it is paired with the short music :D.
I know right? lol it was hilarious she even tried playing a round. She got pwnd, but still it's the effort that counts! XD
Oooh me too! Great game eh?
Good morning! I'm trying to stay optimistic during finals week. lol - http://radar.net/see/2388515
Good morning! I'm trying to stay optimistic during finals week. lol - http://radar.net/see/2388513
Good morning! I'm trying to stay optimistic during finals week. lol - http://radar.net/see/2388511
ugh... bed time. studying+work tomorrow. I have to do some shuffling for Friday night's live stream. But Wednesday sticks.
Sooo good day. I'm pretty sleepy, I should go to bed soon, but hey Simpsons! (I really need a girlfriend to talk to haha)
http://www.blogtv.com/People/lockerhaxor Streaming live! Let's chat! :D
http://ping.fm/QUEnA Streaming live! For who knows how long! :D
http://pownce.com/ is officially offline as of now. Video with thoughts soon to come. But in a nutshell: Pointless move.
going to play some more godfather. I've gotten so far on the game. I just want to see the end :).
can't sleep... oh boy tomorrow is gonna be hard...
Haha YEAH! I just finished part of a video project :D. Going to send it off for review as soon as it's done processing on my hard drive.
We ended up watching this one lol. Godfather will have to wait. - http://radar.net/see/2423533

erm here's the link for the video I just mentioned: http://ping.fm/5zBhH
Before I go open presents thought I'd leave you with a funny video. Enjoy it guys. I'll tell you what I got later lol <|:)!
<|:) <-- I just came up with the elf smiley! Emoticon... Whatever it's called. It's awesome!!!
In about 15min. we Open our presents. :D I am so excited! I cannot wait! Wow that's a really childish thing to send... lol :)
http://ping.fm/VRGqB Merry Christmas! New blog post in the basket!
Dad got out of work. He should be home soon. Thus: dinner, presents, ???, PROFIT.
XD My mom wanted to see Team Fortress 2! That's awesome lol!
enchalada before bed at midnight. crap now i cant sleep. it was good though.
crap it got late fast. thanks a lot team fortress 2 for wasting 3 hours of my time. On the bright side Im really good with a demo man now :D
